type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ : Real},
  ClusterPt x₀ (Filter.principal (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀))) →
    ∀ {f : Real → Real} {L L' : Real}, HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀ → HasDerivWithinAt f L' X x₀ → Eq L L'
name: Chapter10
derivative_unique

type:
∀ (X : Set Real) (x₀ : Real) (f : Real → Real) (motive : (Exists fun L => HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀) → Prop)
  (h : Exists fun L => HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀), (∀ (L : Real) (h : HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀), motive ⋯) → motive h
name: DifferentiableWithinAt
iff
match_1_1

type:
∀ (X : Set Real) (x₀ : Real) (f : Real → Real) (L : Real),
  Iff (HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀)
    (∀ (ε : Real),
      GT.gt ε 0 →
        Exists fun δ =>
          And (GT.gt δ 0)
            (∀ (x : Real),
              Set.instMembership.mem X x →
                Real.instLT.lt (abs (instHSub.hSub x x₀)) δ →
                  Real.instLE.le
                    (abs (instHSub.hSub (instHSub.hSub (f x) (f x₀)) (instHMul.hMul L (instHSub.hSub x x₀))))
                    (instHMul.hMul ε (abs (instHSub.hSub x x₀)))))
name: HasDerivWithinAt
iff_approx_linear

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ f'x₀ g'x₀ : Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
    HasDerivWithinAt g g'x₀ X x₀ → HasDerivWithinAt (instHAdd.hAdd f g) (instHAdd.hAdd f'x₀ g'x₀) X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_add

type: ∀ (X : Set Real) (x₀ : Real), HasDerivWithinAt (fun x => x) 1 X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_id

type: Real → Real
name: Chapter10
f_10_1_6

type:
∀ (n : Int) (x₀ : Real),
  Ne x₀ 0 →
    HasDerivWithinAt (fun x => instHPow.hPow x n) (instHMul.hMul n.cast (instHPow.hPow x₀ (instHSub.hSub n 1)))
      (Set.instSDiff.sdiff Set.univ (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton 0)) x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_zpow

type:
∀ (X : Set Real) (x₀ : Real) (f : Real → Real),
  Iff (DifferentiableWithinAt Real f X x₀) (Exists fun L => HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀)
name: DifferentiableWithinAt
iff

type:
∀ (X : Set Real) (x₀ : Real) (f : Real → Real) (L : Real),
  Iff (HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀)
    (Filter.Tendsto (fun x => instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub (f x) (f x₀)) (instHSub.hSub x x₀))
      (nhdsWithin x₀ (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀))) (nhds L))
name: HasDerivWithinAt
iff

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ f'x₀ g'x₀ : Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  Ne (g x₀) 0 →
    HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
      HasDerivWithinAt g g'x₀ X x₀ →
        HasDerivWithinAt (instHDiv.hDiv f g)
          (instHDiv.hDiv (instHSub.hSub (instHMul.hMul f'x₀ (g x₀)) (instHMul.hMul (f x₀) g'x₀))
            (instHPow.hPow (g x₀) 2))
          X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_div

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ f'x₀ g'x₀ : Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
    HasDerivWithinAt g g'x₀ X x₀ →
      HasDerivWithinAt (instHMul.hMul f g) (instHAdd.hAdd (instHMul.hMul f'x₀ (g x₀)) (instHMul.hMul (f x₀) g'x₀)) X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_mul

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ g'x₀ : Real} {g : Real → Real},
  Ne (g x₀) 0 →
    HasDerivWithinAt g g'x₀ X x₀ →
      HasDerivWithinAt (instHDiv.hDiv 1 g) (instHDiv.hDiv (Real.instNeg.neg g'x₀) (instHPow.hPow (g x₀) 2)) X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_inv

type: ∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ : Real} {f : Real → Real}, DifferentiableWithinAt Real f X x₀ → ContinuousWithinAt f X x₀
name: ContinuousWithinAt
of_differentiableWithinAt

type:
∀ (X : Set Real) {x₀ : Real},
  ClusterPt x₀ (Filter.principal (Set.instSDiff.sdiff X (Set.instSingletonSet.singleton x₀))) →
    ∀ {f : Real → Real} {L : Real},
      HasDerivWithinAt f L X x₀ → DifferentiableWithinAt Real f X x₀ → Eq L (derivWithin f X x₀)
name: Chapter10

type:

  HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
    HasDerivWithinAt g g'x₀ X x₀ → HasDerivWithinAt (instHSub.hSub f g) (instHSub.hSub f'x₀ g'x₀) X x₀

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ : Real} {f : Real → Real} {L : Real},

of_hasDeriv

type:
∀ {X Y : Set Real} {x₀ y₀ f'x₀ g'y₀ : Real} {f g : Real → Real},
  Eq (f x₀) y₀ →
    (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem X x → Set.instMembership.mem Y (f x)) →
      HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ →
        HasDerivWithinAt g g'y₀ Y y₀ → HasDerivWithinAt (Function.comp g f) (instHMul.hMul g'y₀ f'x₀) X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_comp

type: ∀ {X : Set Real} {f : Real → Real}, DifferentiableOn Real f X → ContinuousOn f X
name: ContinuousOn
of_differentiableOn

type:
∀ {X : Set Real} {x₀ f'x₀ : Real} (c : Real) {f : Real → Real},
  HasDerivWithinAt f f'x₀ X x₀ → HasDerivWithinAt (instHSMul.hSMul c f) (instHMul.hMul c f'x₀) X x₀
name: HasDerivWithinAt
of_smul

type:
∀ (n : Nat) (x₀ : Real),
  HasDerivWithinAt (fun x => instHPow.hPow x n) (instHMul.hMul n.cast (instHPow.hPow x₀ (instHSub.hSub n.cast 1)))
    Set.univ x₀
